pages.title: Prologue Cover Page
pages.message: Welcome back, mystery hunters! We decided to archive the old prologue for our patrons over on Patreon, and release a brand, spanking NEW AND IMPROVED prologue crammed with all the lessons we learned in doing the first 50 pages of Monsters and Myriads. "But, Nathan," you may say, "you aren't going to make any progress if you keep redoing what you've outgrown." To which I respond: you're absolutely right. We're going to keep moving after this, promise! Once we post all 7 pages of the new prologue, we'll un-hide the Chapter 1 pages and move on to Chapter 2. So thank you for coming back or starting it fresh! We're so excited and proud of what we're doing, but we are learning everyday how to write/illustrate better. If you have ideas, we'd love to hear them in our Discord! The link is below. :)

pages.title: The First Visitor
pages.message: Who's nightmare do ya think this Visitor was? My money's on a deer hunter, but in Wisconsin that could be anyone. Even your little sister. Especially your little sister. üòÆ Reminder that we will un-hide the rest of Chapter 1 and get back to Chapter 2 in six more pages!

pages.title: First Visitor Attack
pages.message: You might say they don't take kindly to visitors. Or maybe TOO kindly...maybe the shadowy "Judas" was probably just giving the Visitor a big 'ol hug...?

pages.title: Ms. Winters Appears
pages.message: Is it just me, or does that cat have something in its eye?

pages.title: First Blood Title Page
pages.message: It's here! Hang on to your couch, office chair, or whatever seat you're reading from! We're about to officially get started... („Å•Ôø£ 3Ôø£)„Å•

pages.title: Rose finds drugs?
pages.message: Season 1 starting off with a happy dance! What do you think is in the bottle??? Comment your guess in our discord chat!

pages.title: Rose escapes her mother's room
pages.message: From butchering beasts in high heels to jumping out of windows in flip flops...we need to get these girls some sneakers!

pages.title: Donny discovers Rose's escape measures
pages.message: Don't know what Jean usually listens to on her ipod, but it's "ffmmping!"

pages.title: Rose embarrasses herself in front of cats
pages.message: Them cats know a good purple manicure when they see it.

pages.title: Who is the Penguin man?
pages.message: New page and lots of new faces! But the most important face of all...this elusive Mr. Freezy Cee...

pages.title: Zylo is seeing things, and those things have a lot of teeth
pages.message: I could have sworn she had less teeth in the last pannel.

pages.title: He DEFINITELY likes me...
pages.message: You may have wondered if penguin boy has flippers for hands or if it's just part of his costume. Well now you know, you're welcome.

pages.title: Rose coming in hot
pages.message: Poor Mr. "Definitely Not Mr. Freezy Cee" can't catch a break.

pages.title: Rose and Casper Collision
pages.message: And that, kids, was how I met your mother. Hahaha just kidding...unless...

pages.title: Oh nononono Rose got God Blood on her blood
pages.message: Oh nononono, Rose got "God Blood" on her blood. I'm sure everything's fine.

pages.title: He's Bouncy like Rubber, BOING!
pages.message: It's okay dude, we know what One Piece is and WE think you're cool.

pages.title: Blush Overload and Jealous Rage
pages.message: Someone may be jealous... but jury is still out on that.

pages.title: A hero is needed, and Casper will have to do
pages.message: When that rando kid thinks they are the main character.

pages.title: We Moved to Wisconsin
pages.message: Hey guys! So you may have heard we were buying a house. The house is no more! In the mean time, we are setting up camp in Wisconsin (the home of the Monsters and Myriads comic ironically). We're just now getting settled in and figuring out our future adventures. So no new page today, however, pages will continue this Thursday (November 4th). Also, Happy Belated Halloween, you spooky hooligans!

pages.title: Your....Vanilla Cones
pages.message: I don't know which part made me happier to draw, the icecream on the kitty's nose, or Casper vrooooming off into the sunset. Or maybe the phantom newcomer in the depths of the Freezy Cee's custard shack...

pages.title: Here enters the Elusive Mr. Freezy Cee
pages.message: The man, the myth, the legend, Mr. Freezy Cee!! Dropping some hot takes and hard facts. Posting from Colorado Springs this morning (my concept of time has been severely crippled between moving from Ohio to Wisconsin to Colorado, during a daylight savings no less üôÄ).

pages.title: Mr Freezy Cee on the philosophy of penguin pajamas
pages.message: This just in: Mr. Freezy Cee on the philosophy of penguin pajamas.

pages.title: Just about anything can make you interesting
pages.message: Zylo "unmasked", not a penguin after all.

pages.title: Hacker Chick and her Nut Cracker immerges
pages.message: Little known hallmark film coming out this season...Hacker and the NuT Cracker. Buy your tickets today!

pages.title: I'm sure your deserted little twin brothers are fine...
pages.message: I'm sure your deserted little twin brothers are fine, Casper. I mean, they had icecream and an absurd lack of supervision to keep them company.

pages.title: Rose may be tripping afterall
pages.message: Well Rose is certainly tripping on something.

pages.title: Maybe we're both high?
pages.message: Have I been playing too much Pikmin Bloom, or does Quill's ghost need a name? I'm leaning towards Reginald but I am open to suggestions.

pages.title: Uncle Dan finds the kiddos with a broken window
pages.message: All things considered, both Uncle Dan and Rose are taking it all rather well. (‚äô_‚äô;)

pages.title: Uncle Dan to the rescue
pages.message: Typical.

pages.title: Rose isn't crazy, and Quill is gonna help her
pages.message: I didn't grow up with cousins my age, but I imagine this is how general cousinly bickering would go.

pages.title: Chapter 2 Killing Time in Detention
pages.message: Woot woot!! Heading into the next chapter! Thank you all for checking out our comic up til this point! This marks the start of the Monsters & Myriads holiday hiatus where we the creators will be making some fun edits to be revealed this coming January. In the meantime, check out our Discord to join in the conversation and share your ideas/theories. We love to hear from you guys! Merry Christmas all and see you in the new year! üéÑ‚õÑ

pages.title: Holiday Hiatus 2022
pages.message: Hey guys! I hope your holidays were warm and filled with great memories! Over the last few weeks, we've discussed our vision for this comic at length and have finally decided to *drum roll please* remake the prologue for Monsters & Myriads!! ü•≥ü•Ç The one we have now served its purpose in teaching us a lot of lessons about making comics, but over the next few weeks, we intend to breathe new life into the beginning of our novel, setting more clear expections and setting for the story. We will restart our posting schedule the last monday of the month, January 31.
